title: 服务器崩溃怎么解决，下面是崩溃日记（50金粒）
txt_content:
WARN Using outdated version [7.1.14] for Minecraft 1.7.10. Consider updating to 7.1.22.30.06 18:06:16 [服务器] 信息 Holder lookups applied30.06 18:06:16 [服务器] 信息 Injecting itemstacks30.06 18:06:16 [服务器] 信息 Itemstack injection complete30.06 18:06:16 [服务器] ERROR Fatal errors were detected during the transition from PREINITIALIZATION to INITIALIZATION. Loading cannot continue The following coremods do not have a @MCVersion annotation. They may cause problems if this is not the correct version of Minecraft for them.30.06 18:06:38 [服务器] WARN Missing @MCVersion: cofh.asm.LoadingPlugin  
Mod ForbiddenMagic is missing the required element 'version' and a version.properties file could not be found. Falling back to metadata version 1.7.10-0.551

replies.author: User:guest
replies.txt_content:
2608995028 发表于 2017-6-30 20:48
怎么关闭自动更新呢
找那个有问题的mod的对应配置文件夹，打开里面的config.yml，如果没有就打开后缀为.yml的，这一般都是配置文件。然后找“update: ”字样，后面如果是true就改为false

replies.author: User:guest
replies.txt_content: 7.1.14版本太老了，你的mod在自己更新，结果更新出错了，然后就崩了。关掉自动更新，如果没有就不要用

User:guest 发表于 2017-6-30 20:22
7.1.14版本太老了，你的mod在自己更新，结果更新出错了，然后就崩了。关掉自动更新，如果没有就不要用 ...
怎么关闭自动更新呢
